objects.name: Old Barrel
objects.description: A weathered wooden barrel that has seen better days.

properties.true_description: A weathered wooden barrel that has been cleverly modified with a false bottom. Faint scratches around the rim suggest it has been opened frequently.
properties.true_examination_text: The barrel's bottom sounds hollow when tapped, and there are tool marks around the rim indicating it has been modified for concealment.

properties.true_description: A weathered wooden barrel that has been cleverly modified with a false bottom. Faint scratches around the rim suggest it has been opened frequently.
properties.true_examination_text: The barrel's bottom sounds hollow when tapped, and there are tool marks around the rim indicating it has been modified for concealment.
